ComicInfo.Title: Morning Sun; The Splashdown; The Comfy Couch; The Hungry Heart
ComicInfo.Summary:
James Kochalka continues the monthly mayhem involving sandwiches, Fight Boys, a couch andâ€¦ a demon lord from Dimension Zero! And then Laura Knetzger tells a caffeinated tale involving Jack Krak and Grotus!
